description: The best new year cocktails are a mix of flavors and textures. This recipe combines coffee liqueur with hazelnut liqueur, creating an intoxicating scent and taste! Coffee martinis will get you in the holiday spirit with just one sip.
name: Hazelnut Coffee Martini

recipeInstructions.name: Add the hazelnut liqueur, coffee liqueur, vodka, and cream into a cocktail shaker filled with ice.
recipeInstructions.text: Add the hazelnut liqueur, coffee liqueur, vodka, and cream into a cocktail shaker filled with ice.

recipeInstructions.name: Shake well for 1 minute, then strain equally into four glasses.
